My Creative Process

All of my Web projects are based off a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Explaining a project plan and goal, components of a project, define a roles and responsibilities.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Think freely, encourage wild idea, be visual, stay on topic and try to come up with ideas or solutions to a problem.

3

Structure Planning

A Process for finding, structuring, using and communicating the information necessary for design and planning activities

4

Interaction

By clearly define the scope of a project, monitoring process daily, be transparent, and ensure line management support
